headline: newadmin
description:
check and fix this code1. Member Type Dropdown (Player/Staff)
A dropdown menu (Member Type) allows you to specify Player or Staff when adding/editing a member in squad management.
This field is required.
2. Conditional Position Selector
If member type is "Player":
Only player positions (GK, Defender, Midfielder, Forward, etc.) are visible as checkboxes.
If member type is "Staff":
Only staff positions (Coach, Manager, etc.) are visible.
Player position options (defender, GK, etc.) are hidden.
Changing member type will uncheck all previously selected positions for clarity.
3. Multiple Position Selection
You can select multiple positions for a member (both player and staff, as appropriate).
Data is saved to the database as an array.
All selected positions are shown (separated with /) on player cards, staff cards, admin view, and the modal.
4. Age and Height Ranges
Age input: accepts values from 0 to 100 years.
Height input: accepts values from 0 to 300 cm.
Validation matches those ranges.
5. News Publisher Fix
The Publisher Name field is now removed from news management.
When an admin posts news, the publisher is set automatically to the admin’s username (from session storage).
No manual entry needed.
6. Positions “Undefined” Fix on Player Cards
Player cards and staff cards now correctly display all assigned positions. They show empty if none are selected but will never display undefined.
7. Database Adjustments
Database now saves:
memberType (Player/Staff)
positions (array of roles for each member)
The server-side API, POST/PUT, and update logic all handle the new schema and validation for memberType/positions.
8. Miscellaneous
UI alignment, field toggling, and real-time updates for the forms and card displays have all been handled (see above for linter and bug-free status).
You now have:
Full control over distinguishing Players vs Staff when adding/editing members.
Easy, multiple-position assignment for every member.
No confusion on positions, and all are displayed cleanly everywhere.
Age and height ranges set for realistic and broad input.
No more undefined bugs.
News posts linked to the real admin user, with clean UI.
